name: coop-vs-internship-units
description: Compares how co-op and internship credits count toward degree requirements.

events.content: Trying to decide between registering my summer role as a co-op (CPE 494) or an internship (CSC 400). Any difference for units?
Co-op is 12 units over the quarter and pauses financial aid requirements. CSC 400 is just 2 units and keeps you in regular status.
If you want the experience to count as a tech elective, it has to be CSC 400 with the write-up + faculty sponsor sign-off. Co-op counts as free elective.
Appreciate itâ€”I'll stick with CSC 400 for the elective credit.
